title: Taliyah x Ekko OR Ekko x Jinx VOTE!!
body: I'm intrigued to see which is more popular

replies.body: Personally, I ship Taliyah x Ekko over Jinx x Ekko, more fun story material.

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=y1e1fNAz,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-02-19T03:39:45.471+0000)
>
> Personally, I ship Taliyah x Ekko over Jinx x Ekko, more fun story material.

Same. Tech prodigy x magic prodigy, I love that idea.
Why would Taliya x Ekko be a thing?

if you look up in one of Taliyah's special interactions she has one with Ekko that goes more or less like this "did the earth move for you too?wait,did I just said this out loud?"
so that's why it's a thing this ship =3
Jinx{{champion:222}} is a couple with Ziggs{{champion:115}}  lorewise, there is even a comic about their relationship
Jinx has no time for anyone's crap anymore. She's busy blowing stuff up. Taliyah actually has a little crush on Ekko. I think the choice is obvious.

> [{quoted}](name=KestrelGirl,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=y1e1fNAz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-02-17T05:26:21.739+0000)
>
> Jinx has no time for anyone's crap anymore. She's busy blowing stuff up. Taliyah actually has a little crush on Ekko. I think the choice is obvious.

Jinx. Cause the girl that makes the most since and truly cares will never get the guy.  Dudes are dumb that way.

Yo, just gonna say, Jinx x Ekko mostly doesn't make sense.  
It's true that Ekko *used* to have a crush on Jinx, but after she went crazy he completely dropped it.  And even *that* is old lore!  So tbh it's likely that Ekko and Jinx have never had a conversation before.  Taliyah and Ekko haven't either, actually.  Taliyah would only have a crush on Ekko if they *did* happen to meet, but that hasn't happened yet.
That's the thing with ships. The canon is often ignored by most shippers.
Just because Ekko's quotes are from before the Zaun LU, doesn't mean it's not applicable anymore. It's entirely possible Ekko at least knew of Jinx before she went crazy, in the new lore.
